Text:
Thank you so much for posting this!

Please can you post them every month?
It would save me soooo much space.... I've been collecting PWI since the late 80's and I just don't have any more space to collect any more! lol

It would be awesome if I could get a digital copy each month.... Is that possible??
If not through yourself, please point me in the right direction where I would be able to get a digital copy from.

Many thanks!
